code: import flattenStyle from"./flattenStyle";import getDefaultStyleValue from"./getDefaultStyleValue";export default function getStyleValues(keys,style){var values={};var flatStyle=flattenStyle(style);(typeof keys==='string'?[keys]:keys).forEach(function(key){values[key]=key in flatStyle?flatStyle[key]:getDefaultStyleValue(key,flatStyle);});return values;}
